themeOneWorkSection.heading: How Udelo works?
themeOneWorkSection.headingText: Very easy to use app. With these few steps, you are good to start earning money/get your parcels delivered.

workData.title: Install the App
workData.content: Install the pp from either Appstore or google playstore.?

workData.title: Setup your profile
workData.content: Create an account and setup your payment to be able to accept funds after delivery of packages.

workData.title: Enjoy the features!
workData.content: Enjoy the amazing features we have provided to earn money.

themeOneContactSection.heading: Stay Tuned
themeOneContactSection.headingText: Get in touch anytime with your feedback or bugs in rare occassions.
themeOneContactSection.headingTexttwo: We always look forward to hear from you.
themeOneContactSection.content: Contrary to popular belief, we are a customer centered platform, your feedback is very important to us. Keep us in the llop

iconList.text: 7120 Rock Ridge Lane Apt. K, Alexandria Virginia, 22315
